**Institution**: University College Dublin  
**Position**: Postdoc  
**Deadline**: 1 December 2022 

Applications are invited for a 36 months Part-Time (0.5 FTE) post of a UCD Post-doctoral Research Fellow Level 2 within School of Sociology.
 
This is an advanced academic research role, building on your prior experience as a postdoctoral fellow, where you will conduct a specified programme of research supported by research training under the supervision and direction of a Principal Investigator.
